Day 4 of Our Alaskan Cruise- Seeing the Hubbard Glacier ( Don't forget to click on a picture to see a larger version of it)

Would you believe it is 300 feet high!
Too many pictures, but Obie hasn't learned to cull digital pictures yet! Sorry!!!
The glacier just calved--- i.e. an iceberg just broke off


The sound of calving, called white thunder, is awe inspiring
Various shots... Loved this bay! See the river of ice between the mountains.
